attributes.action: Allow Horse Riders Key Access to Mynydd Dinas Mountain Baglan Port Talbot
attributes.additional_details: Allow Horse Riders to be able to apply for and purchase a key to Mynydd Dinas Mountain Baglan and all gated areas over the local mountains for horses to use safely off dangerous roads
attributes.background: Horse riders in the area of Mynydd Dinas Mountain Baglan have for many years been allowed access. The gate has become narrower making it inaccessible to horses. When contacted the Natural Resources Wales they stated the gate had been changed as it was vandalised however access is for footpath only

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise.
